vote.title: To Recognize and Celebrate June 14th as 614 Day in the City of Columbus
vote.description:
Title
 
To Recognize and Celebrate June 14th as 614 Day in the City of Columbus
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, The City-Wide 614 Day was brought to Columbus on June 14th by Yohannan Terrell and Warhol & WALL ST and was officially recognized by the City of Columbus in 2019; and 
 
WHEREAS, 614 Day happens every June 14th and is a day where we celebrate Columbus, OH and is reflective of our great city’s area code; it is a time to celebrate all that makes our city unique, from the food, the local businesses, to the music, the art, and the especially the people; and 
 
WHEREAS, 614 Day is a day where we we eat local, we drink local, we buy local, we support local and we show our pride in our local community; 614 day provides residents from all over the city of Columbus an opportunity to observe our city’s strong relationship with our local business and neighborhoods; and 
 
WHEREAS, 614 Day highlights all that makes our city vibrant and diverse while bringing us all together; now, therefore 
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby recognize and celebrate June 14th as 614 Day in the City of Columbus.
